nodes.bodyText: Are these changes supposed to be backported? The original PR had more changes

Hi Dinu, These seem to be related to the following commits - opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@67fe5d2
and
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@ff00f4f.
I was backporting all commits for my changes for rolesmapping and Palash's changes for opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@e97d30d
and
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@72ce765.
These changes are only related to the rolesmapping and saml related fixes. Let me know if while backporting we should backport other Audit log/whitelisting related changes as well.
